channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Orleston road asphalt around bumps is basically destroyed, 12th August
item.description:
A series of potholes and parts of the road missing around the bumps were spotted on Orleston road. This is very dangerous for cyclists

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2C,2D, Orleston Road, Highbury, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Numerous potholes on the north side of the road where cyclists ride, 12th August
item.description:
Given the limited space for cyclists left by cars and the high traffic of this road, it is extremely dangerous when so many potholes are left unfilled in such a small distance. From Highbury Corner to Highbury Grove there are plenty of potholes that need to be filled on the north side of the road where cyclists ride.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 262, St. Paul's Road, Highbury, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Leaves, 12th August
item.description:
Build up of lots of leaves outside of the school particularly on Hyson road pavement next to school. please can these leaves be removed.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Galleywall Road, Bermondsey, London

item.title: Smashed porcelain on the pavement, 12th August
item.description:
There is smashed porcelain on pavement on Beckenham Grove up by the 367 bus stop into Bromley. It has been there for at least four days and is incredibly dangerous to animals and small children.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Beckenham Grove, Shortlands, London

item.title: Extremely dangerous intersection and unclear flow of traffic, 12th August
item.description:
The Balls Pond Road and Kingsbury Road corner is prone to accidents. Cyclists on both streets are coming at a high speed and visibility is non existent until you reach the very end of the corner. Traffic lights, mirrors or street markings needed!

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Balls Pond Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
